511370.name: Wrath Of The Fire God
511370.description:
Wrath of the Fire God is a fast-paced VR action shooter. The Fire God's army is trying to stop you from retrieving the 4 magical gems stolen from your village. Unleash your magical arrows on the enemies, dodge enemy projectiles and recover the lost gems!

Features

  • Highly immersive and atmospheric VR experience.

  • 4 levels with 4 relentless bosses to keep you engaged for many hours.

  • Stunning HDR graphics, volumetric fog and binaural audio.

  • Unlockable badges, special bows and arrows to unleash your fury on the Fire God's army.

  • Get on the leaderboards by killing the most enemies.

  • Supports Vive & Oculus Rift controllers.

  • Two graphics modes for high and low end video cards.
